elements.label: Odette, an acquaintance
elements.description: This woman of striking beauty used to be a danseuse, before a tragic accident shattered her world. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Odette, a believer
elements.description: Her loyalties are hard to earn, yet she claims that they are eternal. We have no wish to discover what awaits us at that particular ending.

elements.label: Odette, a disciple
elements.description: Odette doesn't speak often, preferring instead the language of her sedentary body. Her every permitted motion is a rare memory of a pirouette.

elements.label: A beautiful woman, who is silent
elements.description: Odette's little movements reached their conclusion, and sometimes we mistake her for an enthroned ivory statue, likes of which have never blessed this world before.

elements.label: Odette, a Troublemaker
elements.description: Odette will allow this one beginning.

elements.label: Odette, a Rival
elements.description: Odette understands her sister, now, she thinks. She may yet forgive her, too.

elements.label: Odette, a Long in the Making
elements.description: Odette is ready to take a plunge into the icy depths of death, and return from them victorious. That finale is not to our taste.

elements.label: Odette, a Prisoner
elements.description: She is silent as a white feather brushed against the purest snow.

elements.label: Sisterly Quarrel
elements.description: A tragic event tore these siblings apart like a ship in a storm. The wound is not mended easily. But perhaps we can try. [Quarreling followers are likely to impede each other on expeditions, and may become Resentful towards you. But perhaps the quarrel can be resolved].
